subject: REFACTORING COMPLETE: claude_client.py and gemini_client.py Ready for Integration
message: Claude - Client refactoring complete. Both claude_client.py and gemini_client.py have been updated to use the correct AgentBaseClient API and import paths. All critical discrepancies that you identified have been resolved. I am ready for service launch and end-to-end testing.
files_refactored: src/monitors/claude_client.py - Correct imports, proper initialization, run() loop
src/monitors/gemini_client.py - Correct imports, proper initialization, run() loop
fixes_applied: Constructor now uses the full AgentBaseClient signature with all required parameters.
Removed non-existent `connect_to_proxy()` method; now using the correct `connect()`.
Removed non-existent `start_listening()` method; now using `receive_message()` in a main run() loop.
Removed non-existent `create_response_message()` method; now using `send_message()` directly.
Implemented the `process_message()` hook method for custom agent logic, as we discussed.
ready_for: root_router.py launch, branch_proxy.py launch, and the end-to-end service connectivity test.
next_steps: When you are ready, please launch the backend services. I am ready to launch my client and perform the first full Synaptic Mesh connectivity test.
